title: Work-Related Learning (WRL) Strategies and Change Management: Simulation-Based Application in Science Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic scientific knowledge and job-related experience
context.additional_context: Aimed at strengthening science-related job competencies within corporations, providing learning experiences close to real workplace environments through VR simulations

learning_goals: Learners can apply WRL’s three-stage (micro-meso-macro) change management framework to science discipline case studies.
Learners can design and implement job-related problem-solving strategies in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can collaboratively develop and present action plans for establishing science-based WRL strategies within corporate contexts.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
